DOC.brief_summary: ProMO aim investigate effectiveness newly develop ONS increase body weight , muscle mass function malnourish elderly compare standard care .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Efficacy Novel Oral Supplement Tackling Malnutrition Elderly
DOC.criteria: age 65+ risk malnutrition/ malnourish • Mental status incompatible proper conduct study Illness severity life expectancy consider less 12 month Use diabetes medication ( e.g . insulin , methformin ) Use oral nutritional supplement previous three month Participating regular exercise training program ( ≥2h/w ) Renal insufficiency ( eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Unstable organ failure organ failure necessitate special diet Chronic corticosteroid use Recent ( previous 2 month ) use antibiotic Recent ( previous 3 month ) change habitual medication use ( e.g statin thyroxin ) Recent blood donation ( < 1 month prior Day 01 study ) Not willing afraid give blood study Allergic sensitive milk protein Reported vegan macrobiotic lifestyle Drug and/or alcohol abuse ( current consumption 21 alcoholic drink per week ) Individual unable give inform consent Current participation research Division Human Nutrition Not general practitioner Personnel Wageningen University , department Human Nutrition , partner first second degree relative
